original_text: Then the disciples began to argue with each other. They argued about which of them was the most important.
korean_text: 제자 중에서 누가 크냐 하는 변론이 일어나니

sentences.original_text: Then the disciples began to argue
They argued about which of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들 중 누구에 대해 다했습니다
